summary: "La Vida Loca" reflects a depressing and hopeless reality. The documentary, by photojournalist and filmmaker Christian Poveda, follows some of the members of "la dieciocho", the so-called ... See full summary »
cast: José Roberto Martínez|Silvia Portillo López|Ana Burgos Arévalo|José Luis Rosales|Jeaneth Ramírez Villacorta|Erik Palacio López|Cinthya Cuéllar López|Melvin Bonilla Hernández|José Hernández Guzmán|Daniel Ayala Gutiérrez|Carlos Armando Molina|César Hernández Escalante|Edwin Antonio Llanes|Fabio Arévalo Rodríguez|Luis Romero Gavidia|José Heriberto Enríquez|Miriam Cabezas Miranda|José Rosa Laguardia|Eduardo Colocho Olivares|Elvin Jerez Hidalgo|José Montoya Campos|Rodrigo Ávila|Aida Santos de Escobar|Patricia Bordales|Lydia Flores Granados
title: La vida loca
